item.description:
Hello All,

We had a great time at our first meetup and I'm looking forward to the next one. It was a pleasure to meet everyone. We talked about the next dinner excursion and we thought we would try a Japanese restaurant this time. I was thinking it also might be fun to get a private room and sit on the floor. Most places now have a hole in the floor so your not sitting with your legs crossed. I know there are some good Japanese restaurants in West Haven or if anyone would like to suggest a good place, that would be great. I'll chose a place within the next 10 days.
Cheers,
Kathy

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: The New Haven Dining Out November Meetup
